channel.title: Hoclaus vs Proof
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Hoclaus vs Proof" - how rare is storybook ?

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded: Yup, Megamissions will net you 10% more pages in the long run.

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded: Actually, Mega-missions are better over time, especially when you're farming multiple hundreds of something like Storybook Pages. Yes there will be days you don't get anything, but they will be made up for by the days you get 50+.

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded: Juice at maximum, +100% drop chance theme, Olmek + HoClaus + Proof and running normal missions, not megamissions, should be the best for you. My personal maximum was 30-odd pages for 1100-ish stamina, but I've heard of players who managed 40+â€¦and probably the all-time record is even higher than that^^

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded: drinking juise helps but not much (1-3more drops)

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded: I got screwed today, olmek, stand your ninja, proofreader only got 4 pages spend 1140 stamina+

item.title: Re: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded:
Proof Reader has a 3% drop rate. This has been confirmed by McMasters in Billy club QnA. So 3% (Proof Reader) + 3% (SbyN) + 1.5% (HoClaus) = 7.5%

7.5% of 70 missions = 5.25 drops.

Is it usual. No. Is it within the expected range for 70 misisons? Yes. Some days you just get screwed by the RNG.

item.title: Hoclaus vs Proof
item.content:encoded:
70x did A-mission with stand by your ninja theme and hoclaus+proof+olmek team. this proof only droped storybook 3x. it is normal ?

tq
